rules: Type `!play` in chat and the bot will play a random kpop song in VC. The goal of this game is to be the first person to guess the song name in chat. [Join our support server for more help!](https://discord.gg/RCuzwYV). Use `!help [command]` to get more details about a command. [Click here to see more details about how to play.](https://github.com/Brainicism/KMQ_Discord/blob/master/GAMEPLAY.md)
